name: sentry-zaraz-consent-integration
description: Adjust Sentry configuration according to current Zaraz Consent selection

scripts.build: npx tsc src/SentryZarazConsentIntegration.ts --outDir dist --target es2020 --module es2020 --lib es2020,dom --moduleResolution node --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck --declaration
scripts.build:watch: npx tsc src/SentryZarazConsentIntegration.ts --outDir dist --target es2020 --module es2020 --lib es2020,dom --moduleResolution node --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck --declaration --watch
scripts.demo:dev: npm run build && cd demo && npm run dev
scripts.demo:build: npm run build && cd demo && npm run build

author: v.v.danyliuk@gmail.com
